title: 02/03/2021 - HOUR 3 - Terry Bradshaw, Two Truths And A Lie
itunes:title: 02/03/2021 - HOUR 3 - Terry Bradshaw, Two Truths And A Lie
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Hall of Fame and Super Bowl champion quarterback Terry Bradshaw joins Colin to discuss his playing days, including his Super Bowl experiences. Also, Joy Taylor tries to stump Colin with the game, "Two Truths and a Lie."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
